channel.title: Jazz on Nithya Shikarpur
channel.description: Recent content in Jazz on Nithya Shikarpur

item.title: Tap Tap Revolution: A study of rhythm reproduction from jazz solos with visual aids
item.description: For my HCI course project in Fall 2022, I decided to study the role of visual aids such as piano roll and music notation in aiding the memorization and reproduction of note onset timings in a jazz improvisation with respect to a backing track.

item.title: Piyu Bole - with a jazz twist
item.description: This is an adaptation of the famous Bollywood song Piyu Bole, from the movie Parineeta with a twist.

item.title: Fly Me To The Moon
item.description: This is my arrangement of fly me to the moon by Frank Sinatra.

item.title: Waltz for Debby
item.description: Here is our take on Waltz for Debby by Bill Evans.
